mapper.insert: insert into trip_fs (fs_no, fs_tit, fs_ads, fs_content, fs_local, fs_id, fs_category, fs_price) values (seq_fs.nextval, #{title}, #{address}, #{content}, #{local}, #{localId}, #{localCategory}, #{price})
mapper.update: update trip_fs set fs_title=#{title}, fs_content=#{content}, fs_price=#{price}, fs_local=#{local}, fs_id="#{localId}", fs_category=#{localCategory} updated_at = sysdate where fno = #{fno}
update trip_fs set user_count = #{count} where fno=#{fno}
